messages.subject: Re:  wladorf homeschooling sites
messages.msgSnippet: Beth, That s a new one, the list owner is a part of WE_HS@onelist.com.  So I ll have to check that one out as well. Other sites for those interested in
messages.messageBody:
Beth,

That's a new one, the list owner is a part of WE_HS@onelist.com. So I'll
have to check that one out as well.

Other sites for those interested in combining Waldorf with homeschooling:
Waldorf Homeschoolers Exchange
www.chickpages.com/brainiacs/windworks/wehs.html

Rudolf Steiner College Bookstore
www.steinercollege.org/curriculum.html

AWSNA
www.awsna.org/publications/books.htm

Warmly,
Laura

>
>Hi Laura,
>I went to onelist not through this link
>http://www.onelist.com/community/waldorfhomeschoolers
